content: in this legal case party a filed a lawsuit against party b regarding the division of their joint assets the court granted party as request for a divorce and dissolved their marriage the joint assets include a toyota iq vehicle and a loan obligation with inbank party a wants to keep the vehicle and be compensated for their share of its value as well as for 50 of the outstanding loan the parties also request the deletion of party bs name from the vehicles registration the court ruled in favor of party a dividing the assets accordingly party a will keep the vehicle and be solely responsible for the loan agreement with auto24 while party b will be responsible for the loan agreement with lhv finance party a was awarded compensation in the amount of 720753 euros party a will bear their own procedural costs including translation costs and party b will bear their own procedural costs party b is required to pay the translation costs within 30 days and failure to do so may result in additional penalties
